Open positions

Customer support specialist (GER)

Wiesbaden, Germany

Job Summary:

We are currently seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented Customer Support Specialist to join our team.

As a Customer Support Specialist, you will be responsible for providing exceptional customer service and support to our clients.

You will be the first point of contact for customers, and your primary responsibility will be to provide timely and accurate responses to customer inquiries, complaints, and issues.

Click Read more for requirements.

Customer support specialist (ITA)

Torino, Italy

Job Summary:

This role is responsible for providing excellent customer service and support to clients.

They will be the first point of contact for customers and will assist with inquiries, complaints, and issues.

The primary responsibilities of this role include responding to inquiries in a timely and accurate manner, resolving customer issues and complaints, and documenting customer interactions and maintaining accurate records.

Click Read more for requirements.

Search engine optimization specialist

Wiesbaden, Germany

Job Summary:

We are seeking an experienced and results-driven SEO Specialist to join our team.

As an SEO Specialist, you will be responsible for improving our clients' search engine rankings and driving traffic to their websites.

You will work closely with the marketing team to develop and implement SEO strategies, conduct keyword research, optimize website content, and track website performance metrics.
